document_data.name: Nathra
document_data.mainbody: '''Nathra''' was an [[elf]] [[mage]] of the early 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was an orphan. She married [[Phanturgost]], and gave birth to [[Ieiridauna Amalree]].
document_data.History:
In her time, Nathra had traveled widely in the lands of men before settling down with [[Phanturgost]].

She died in early autumn of {{yearlink|1036}}, after inviting eight sorcerers from lands south of [[Calimshan]] with whom she and her husband had been exploring a [[Netherese]] ruin. The sorcerers slew the two of them swiftly, but encountered difficulty slaying their daughter.
